data.text:
Love at Large is a UK rental VHS release by Virgin Premiere. Distributed by RCA/Columbia Pictures International Video.

Release date: TBA 1990

Theatrical date: March 9, 1990 (USA); November 2, 1990 (UK)

Catalogue number: VOR 137
